trans-unit.source: Listens to the file system change notifications and raises events when a directory, or file in a directory, changes.
trans-unit.target: 侦听文件系统更改通知，并在目录或目录中的文件发生更改时引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> to watch for changes in a specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>若要监视的指定目录中的更改。

trans-unit.source: You can watch for changes in files and subdirectories of the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 你可以监视文件和子目录的指定目录中的更改。

trans-unit.source: You can create a component to watch files on a local computer, a network drive, or a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建一个组件来监视本地计算机、 网络驱动器或远程计算机上的文件。

trans-unit.source: To watch for changes in all files, set the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A> property to an empty string ("") or use wildcards ("*.\*").
trans-unit.target: 若要监视的所有文件中的更改，请设置<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A>属性为空字符串 ("") 或使用通配符 ("*。\*")。

trans-unit.source: To watch a specific file, set the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A> property to the file name.
trans-unit.target: 若要监视的特定文件，<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A>到的文件名称的属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, to watch for changes in the file MyDoc.txt, set the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A> property to "MyDoc.txt".
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要监视的文件 MyDoc.txt 中的更改，请设置<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A>"MyDoc.txt"的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can also watch for changes in a certain type of file.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以观看某种类型的文件中的更改。

trans-unit.source: For example, to watch for changes in text files, set the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A> property to "\*.txt".
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要监视的文本文件中的更改，请设置<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A>属性设置为"\*.txt"。

trans-unit.source: There are several types of changes you can watch for in a directory or file.
trans-unit.target: 有几种类型的可监视的目录或文件中的更改。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can watch for changes in `Attributes`, the `LastWrite` date and time, or the `Size` of files or directories.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以监视中的更改`Attributes`、`LastWrite`日期和时间，或`Size`的文件或目录。

trans-unit.source: This is done by setting the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A> property to one of the <xref:System.IO.NotifyFilters> values.
trans-unit.target: 这可通过设置<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A>属性之一<xref:System.IO.NotifyFilters>值。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the type of changes you can watch, see <xref:System.IO.NotifyFilters>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以观看上的更改类型的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.IO.NotifyFilters>。

trans-unit.source: You can watch for renaming, deletion, or creation of files or directories.
trans-unit.target: 你可以监视重命名，删除或创建文件或目录。

trans-unit.source: For example, to watch for renaming of text files, set the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A> property to "*.txt" and call the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.WaitForChanged%2A> method with a <xref:System.IO.WatcherChangeTypes.Renamed> specified for its parameter.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要监视的文本文件的重命名，请设置<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A>属性设置为"*.txt"并调用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.WaitForChanged%2A>方法替换<xref:System.IO.WatcherChangeTypes.Renamed>指定为其参数。

trans-unit.source: The Windows operating system notifies your component of file changes in a buffer created by the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>.
trans-unit.target: Windows 操作系统会通知你组件创建的缓冲区中的文件发生更改<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>。

trans-unit.source: If there are many changes in a short time, the buffer can overflow.
trans-unit.target: 如果在短时间内有很多更改，则缓冲区可能溢出。

trans-unit.source: This causes the component to lose track of changes in the directory, and it will only provide blanket notification.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致无法继续在目录中，更改跟踪的组件，它将仅向提供全面通知。

trans-unit.source: Increasing the size of the buffer with the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A> property is expensive, as it comes from non-paged memory that cannot be swapped out to disk, so keep the buffer as small yet large enough to not miss any file change events.
trans-unit.target: 增加使用缓冲区的大小<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A>属性开销较大，因为它来自无法换出到磁盘，因此尚未保持缓冲区尽可能小的非分页内存大型足以不会丢失任何文件更改事件。

trans-unit.source: To avoid a buffer overflow, use the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A> and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A> properties so you can filter out unwanted change notifications.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免缓冲区溢出，使用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A>和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A>属性，以便你可以筛选掉不需要更改通知。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>, see the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>，请参阅<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Please note the following when using the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> class.
trans-unit.target: 请注意以下，当使用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>类。

trans-unit.source: Hidden files are not ignored.
trans-unit.target: 不忽略隐藏的文件。

trans-unit.source: In some systems, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> reports changes to files using the short 8.3 file name format.
trans-unit.target: 在某些系统中，<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>报告使用短 8.3 文件名格式的文件更改。

trans-unit.source: For example, a change to "LongFileName.LongExtension" could be reported as "LongFil~.Lon".
trans-unit.target: 例如，对"LongFileName.LongExtension"的更改可能被报告为"LongFil ~。Lon"。

trans-unit.source: This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members.
trans-unit.target: 此类包含链接要求，并且在类级别应用于所有成员继承要求。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>直接调用方或派生的类没有完全信任权限时，将引发。

trans-unit.source: For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size you can set for the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A> property for monitoring a directory over the network is 64 KB.
trans-unit.target: 你可以为设置的最大大小<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A>通过网络监视目录的属性为 64 KB。

trans-unit.source: Running <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> on Windows 98 is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 运行<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>不支持在 Windows 98 上。

trans-unit.source: Copying and moving folders
trans-unit.target: 复制和移动文件夹

trans-unit.source: The operating system and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> object interpret a cut-and-paste action or a move action as a rename action for a folder and its contents.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>对象解释某个剪切和粘贴操作，或者作为文件夹及其内容的重命名操作的移动操作。

trans-unit.source: If you cut and paste a folder with files into a folder being watched, the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> object reports only the folder as new, but not its contents because they are essentially only renamed.
trans-unit.target: 如果将剪切并粘贴到所监视的文件夹的文件的文件夹<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>对象报告仅为新的该文件夹，但而非其内容，因为它们仅实质上是重命名。

trans-unit.source: To be notified that the contents of folders have been moved or copied into a watched folder, provide <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged%2A> and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnRenamed%2A> event handler methods as suggested in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 若要得到通知文件夹的内容已移动或复制到受监视的文件夹，请提供<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged%2A>和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnRenamed%2A>根据下表中的建议的事件处理程序方法。

trans-unit.source: Event Handler
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序

trans-unit.source: Events Handled
trans-unit.target: 处理事件

trans-unit.source: Performs
trans-unit.target: 执行

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed>, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed>, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted>

trans-unit.source: Report changes in file attributes, created files, and deleted files.
trans-unit.target: 报告中文件属性、 创建的文件和已删除的文件的更改。

trans-unit.source: List the old and new paths of renamed files and folders, expanding recursively if needed.
trans-unit.target: 列出的旧和新路径的重命名的文件和文件夹，如果需要扩展以递归方式。

trans-unit.source: Events and Buffer Sizes
trans-unit.target: 事件和缓冲区大小

trans-unit.source: Note that several factors can affect which file system change events are raised, as described by the following:
trans-unit.target: 请注意，几个因素可以影响引发哪些文件系统更改事件，如以下所述：

trans-unit.source: Common file system operations might raise more than one event.
trans-unit.target: 常见的文件系统操作可能会引发多个事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, when a file is moved from one directory to another, several <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged%2A> and some <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A> and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnDeleted%2A> events might be raised.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当文件从一个目录移到另一个、 几个<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged%2A>和某些<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A>和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnDeleted%2A>可能引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Moving a file is a complex operation that consists of multiple simple operations, therefore raising multiple events.
trans-unit.target: 移动文件一个复杂的操作的多个简单操作组成，因此会引发多个事件。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, some applications (for example, antivirus software) might cause additional file system events that are detected by <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>.
trans-unit.target: 同样，某些应用程序 （例如，防病毒软件） 可能会导致检测到的其他文件系统事件<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> can watch disks as long as they are not switched or removed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>可以观看磁盘，只要它们不会切换或删除。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> does not raise events for CDs and DVDs, because time stamps and properties cannot change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>不会引发事件 Cd 和 Dvd，由于不能更改时间戳和属性。

trans-unit.source: Remote computers must have one of the required platforms installed for the component to function properly.
trans-unit.target: 远程计算机必须具有以正常组件的安装的所需平台之一。

trans-unit.source: If multiple <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> objects are watching the same UNC path in Windows XP prior to Service Pack 1, or Windows 2000 SP2 or earlier, then only one of the objects will raise an event.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择多个<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>对象正在监视的相同的 UNC 路径，在 Service Pack 1 之前的 Windows XP 或 Windows 2000 SP2 或更早版本，则仅之一对象将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: On machines running Windows XP SP1 and newer, Windows 2000 SP3 or newer or Windows Server 2003, all <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> objects will raise the appropriate events.
trans-unit.target: 在计算机上运行 Windows XP SP1 和更高版本，Windows 2000 SP3 或更高版本或 Windows Server 2003 中，所有<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>对象将引发相应的事件。

trans-unit.source: Note that a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> may miss an event when the buffer size is exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>可能会丢失超出缓冲区大小时发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: To avoid missing events, follow these guidelines:
trans-unit.target: 若要避免丢失事件，请遵循以下准则：

trans-unit.source: Increase the buffer size by setting the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 增加缓冲区大小设置<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Avoid watching files with long file names, because a long file name contributes to filling up the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 避免监视具有长文件名的文件，因为分配给填满缓冲区的长文件名。

trans-unit.source: Consider renaming these files using shorter names.
trans-unit.target: 请考虑重命名这些文件使用较短名称。

trans-unit.source: Keep your event handling code as short as possible.
trans-unit.target: 保持您的事件处理代码尽可能短。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> to watch the directory specified at run time.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>监视在运行时指定的目录。

trans-unit.source: The component is set to watch for changes in `LastWrite` and `LastAccess` time, the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory.
trans-unit.target: 该组件设置以监视中的更改`LastWrite`和`LastAccess`时间、 创建、 删除或重命名的目录中的文本文件。

trans-unit.source: If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file prints to the console.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件是更改、 创建，或删除，该文件的路径将打印到控制台。

trans-unit.source: When a file is renamed, the old and new paths print to the console.
trans-unit.target: 当文件已重命名，旧的和新路径打印到控制台。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics> and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics>和<xref:System.IO>对于此示例的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: for deriving from the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 为派生自<see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo" />类。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Named Permission Sets: <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />;命名权限集： <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: You cannot watch a remote computer that does not have Windows NT or Windows 2000.
trans-unit.target: 没有 Windows NT 或 Windows 2000 的远程计算机，则无法将其收看。

trans-unit.source: You cannot watch a remote Windows NT 4.0 computer from a Windows NT 4.0 computer.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows NT 4.0 的计算机的远程 Windows NT 4.0 计算机，则无法将其收看。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的实例的初始属性值<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: bitwise OR combination of `LastWrite`, `FileName`, and `DirectoryName`
trans-unit.target: 按位 OR 组合`LastWrite`， `FileName`，和 `DirectoryName`

trans-unit.source: "*.\*" (Watch all files.)
trans-unit.target: "*.\*"（监视所有文件。）

trans-unit.source: empty string ("")
trans-unit.target: 空字符串 ("")

trans-unit.source: The component will not watch the specified directory until the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A> is set, and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 该组件将不监视指定的目录，直到<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A>设置，和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> object to watch the directory specified at run time.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>要监视在运行时指定的目录对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> object watches for changes in `LastWrite` and `LastAccess` times, and for the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>对象监视中的更改`LastWrite`和`LastAccess`时间，以及创建、 删除或重命名的文本将文件目录中。

trans-unit.source: If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file displays to the console.
trans-unit.target: 如果更改文件、 将其创建，或删除，将显示在控制台文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: When a file is renamed, the old and new paths display to the console.
trans-unit.target: 当文件已重命名时，则向控制台显示的旧和新路径。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Diagnostics> and <xref:System.IO> namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Diagnostics>和<xref:System.IO>命名空间。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: The directory to monitor, in standard or Universal Naming Convention (UNC) notation.
trans-unit.target: 要监视的目录，以标准表示法或通用命名约定 (UNC) 表示法表示。

trans-unit.target: 该组件将不监视指定的目录，直到<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A>设置，和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.target: 该组件可以监视你的个人计算机、 网络驱动器或远程计算机上的文件。

trans-unit.source: You cannot watch a remote Windows NT 4.0 computer from a Windows NT 4.0 computer.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows NT 4.0 的计算机的远程 Windows NT 4.0 计算机，则无法将其收看。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="path" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="filter" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 参数为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The path specified through the <paramref name="path" /> parameter does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 通过 <paramref name="path" /> 参数指定的路径不存在。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is too long.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 过长。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Begins the initialization of a <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher" /> used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: 开始初始化在窗体上使用或由另一个组件使用的 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher" />。

trans-unit.source: The initialization occurs at run time.
trans-unit.target: 初始化发生在运行时。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] design environment uses this method to start the initialization of a component used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]设计环境使用此方法来启动的组件初始化窗体上使用或由另一个组件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.EndInit%2A> method ends the initialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.EndInit%2A>方法初始化已结束。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.EndInit%2A> methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.EndInit%2A>方法阻止控件完全初始化之前使用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a file or directory in the specified <see cref="P:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path" /> is changed.
trans-unit.target: 当更改指定 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path" /> 中的文件和目录时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed> event is raised when changes are made to the size, system attributes, last write time, last access time, or security permissions of a file or directory in the directory being monitored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed>大小发生更改时引发事件时，系统属性，上次写入时间、 上次访问时间或文件或目录的安全权限在所监视的目录中。

trans-unit.source: Common file system operations might raise more than one event.
trans-unit.target: 常见的文件系统操作可能会引发多个事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, when a file is moved from one directory to another, several <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged%2A> and some <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A> and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnDeleted%2A> events might be raised.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当文件从一个目录移到另一个、 几个<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged%2A>和某些<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A>和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnDeleted%2A>可能引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Moving a file is a complex operation that consists of multiple simple operations, therefore raising multiple events.
trans-unit.target: 移动文件一个复杂的操作的多个简单操作组成，因此会引发多个事件。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, some applications (for example, antivirus software) might cause additional file system events that are detected by <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>.
trans-unit.target: 同样，某些应用程序 （例如，防病毒软件） 可能会导致检测到的其他文件系统事件<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A> to restrict the number of notifications raised when this event is handled.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A>来限制在处理此事件时引发的通知数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed> event is raised unexpectedly when a file is renamed, but is not raised when a directory is renamed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed>时某个文件被重命名，但重命名目录时，则不会引发意外引发事件。

trans-unit.source: To watch for renaming, use the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Renamed> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要监视的重命名，请使用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Renamed>事件。

trans-unit.source: The order in which the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed> event is raised in relation to the other <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> events may change when the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.SynchronizingObject%2A> property is not `null`.
trans-unit.target: 顺序<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed>相对于其他引发事件<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>事件可能会更改时<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.SynchronizingObject%2A>属性不是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed> event to display the file path to the console whenever the watched file is changed.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed>事件来监视的文件更改时向控制台显示的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a file or directory in the specified <see cref="P:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path" /> is created.
trans-unit.target: 当在指定 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path" /> 中创建文件和目录时发生。

trans-unit.source: Some common occurrences, such as copying or moving a file or directory, do not correspond directly to an event, but these occurrences do cause events to be raised.
trans-unit.target: 一些常见的事件，例如复制或移动文件或目录，直接与某个事件，并不对应，但这些匹配项便会导致要引发事件。

trans-unit.source: When you copy a file or directory, the system raises a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created> event in the directory to which the file was copied, if that directory is being watched.
trans-unit.target: 复制文件或目录时，系统将引发<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>文件被复制到，如果该目录正在受监视的目录中的事件。

trans-unit.source: If the directory from which you copied was being watched by another instance of <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>, no event would be raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在由另一个实例的监视从中复制的目录<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>，会引发任何事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, you create two instances of <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你创建的两个实例<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>。

trans-unit.source: FileSystemWatcher1 is set to watch "C:\My Documents", and FileSystemWatcher2 is set to watch "C:\Your Documents".
trans-unit.target: FileSystemWatcher1 设置为监视"C:\My Documents"和 FileSystemWatcher2 设置为监视"C:\Your 文档"。

trans-unit.source: If you copy a file from "My Documents" into "Your Documents", a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created> event will be raised by FileSystemWatcher2, but no event is raised for FileSystemWatcher1.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将文件从"我的文档"复制到"你的文档"， <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created> FileSystemWatcher2，将引发事件，但对于 FileSystemWatcher1 引发任何事件。

trans-unit.source: Unlike copying, moving a file or directory would raise two events.
trans-unit.target: 与复制不同，移动文件或目录将引发两个事件。

trans-unit.source: From the previous example, if you moved a file from "My Documents" to "Your Documents", a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created> event would be raised by FileSystemWatcher2 and a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted> event would be raised by FileSystemWatcher1.
trans-unit.target: 从前面的示例中，如果从"我的文档"文件移至"您的文档"， <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created> FileSystemWatcher2 时将引发事件和一个<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted>FileSystemWatcher1 时将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Common file system operations might raise more than one event.
trans-unit.target: 常见的文件系统操作可能会引发多个事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, when a file is moved from one directory to another, several <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged%2A> and some <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A> and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnDeleted%2A> events might be raised.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当文件从一个目录移到另一个、 几个<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged%2A>和某些<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A>和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnDeleted%2A>可能引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Moving a file is a complex operation that consists of multiple simple operations, therefore raising multiple events.
trans-unit.target: 移动文件一个复杂的操作的多个简单操作组成，因此会引发多个事件。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, some applications (for example, antivirus software) might cause additional file system events that are detected by <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>.
trans-unit.target: 同样，某些应用程序 （例如，防病毒软件） 可能会导致检测到的其他文件系统事件<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>。

trans-unit.source: The order in which the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created> event is raised in relation to the other <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> events may change when the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.SynchronizingObject%2A> property is not `null`.
trans-unit.target: 顺序<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>相对于其他引发事件<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>事件可能会更改时<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.SynchronizingObject%2A>属性不是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A> event is raised as soon as a file is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A>创建一个文件时，就会立即引发事件。

trans-unit.source: If a file is being copied or transferred into a watched directory, the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A> event will be raised immediately, followed by one or more <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged%2A> events.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件正在复制或传输到受监视的目录，<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A>将立即引发事件后, 跟一个或多个<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged%2A>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created> event to display the file path to the console whenever the watched file is created.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>事件，以向控制台显示的文件路径，每当创建监视的文件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a file or directory in the specified <see cref="P:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path" /> is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 删除指定 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path" /> 中的文件或目录时发生。

trans-unit.target: 一些常见的事件，例如复制或移动文件或目录，直接与某个事件，并不对应，但这些匹配项便会导致要引发事件。

trans-unit.target: 复制文件或目录时，系统将引发<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>文件被复制到，如果该目录正在受监视的目录中的事件。

trans-unit.target: 如果正在由另一个实例的监视从中复制的目录<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>，会引发任何事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, you create two instances of <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你创建的两个实例<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>。

trans-unit.source: FileSystemWatcher1 is set to watch "C:\My Documents", and FileSystemWatcher2 is set to watch "C:\Your Documents".
trans-unit.target: FileSystemWatcher1 设置为监视"C:\My Documents"和 FileSystemWatcher2 设置为监视"C:\Your 文档"。

trans-unit.target: 从前面的示例中，如果从"我的文档"文件移至"您的文档"， <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created> FileSystemWatcher2 时将引发事件和一个<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted>FileSystemWatcher1 时将引发事件。

trans-unit.target: 常见的文件系统操作可能会引发多个事件。

trans-unit.target: 例如，当文件从一个目录移到另一个、 几个<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged%2A>和某些<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A>和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnDeleted%2A>可能引发事件。

trans-unit.target: 移动文件一个复杂的操作的多个简单操作组成，因此会引发多个事件。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, some applications (for example, antivirus software) might cause additional file system events that are detected by <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>.
trans-unit.target: 同样，某些应用程序 （例如，防病毒软件） 可能会导致检测到的其他文件系统事件<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>。

trans-unit.source: The order in which the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted> event is raised in relation to the other <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> events may change when the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.SynchronizingObject%2A> property is not `null`.
trans-unit.target: 顺序<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted>相对于其他引发事件<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>事件可能会更改时<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.SynchronizingObject%2A>属性不是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted> event to display the file path to the console whenever the watched file is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted>事件，以删除监视的文件时，向控制台显示的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> invokes the protected <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Dispose%2A> method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> 调用受保护<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Dispose%2A>方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Dispose%2A> with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Dispose%2A>与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> references.
trans-unit.target: 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象<see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see cref="M:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see cref="M:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用此组件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the component is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用此组件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If you are using the component on a designer in [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], the default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] 的设计器上使用该组件，则默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The component will not raise events unless you set <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 组件将不会引发事件，除非你设置<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>到`true`。

trans-unit.source: The component will not watch the specified directory until the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A> property has been set and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 该组件将不监视指定的目录，直到<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A>设置属性和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.WaitForChanged%2A> method allows event handlers to be invoked to respond to file changes even if this property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.WaitForChanged%2A>方法允许将调用响应文件更改，即使此属性设置为事件处理程序`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> to watch the directory specified at run time.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>监视在运行时指定的目录。

trans-unit.source: The component is set to watch for changes in `LastWrite` and `LastAccess` time, the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory.
trans-unit.target: 该组件设置以监视中的更改`LastWrite`和`LastAccess`时间、 创建、 删除或重命名的目录中的文本文件。

trans-unit.source: If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file prints to the console.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件是更改、 创建，或删除，该文件的路径将打印到控制台。

trans-unit.source: When a file is renamed, the old and new paths print to the console.
trans-unit.target: 当文件已重命名，旧的和新路径打印到控制台。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics> and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics>和<xref:System.IO>对于此示例的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher" /> 对象已释放。

trans-unit.source: The current operating system is not Microsoft Windows NT or later.
trans-unit.target: 当前操作系统不是 Microsoft Windows NT 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: The directory specified in <see cref="P:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path" /> could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 未能找到 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path" /> 中指定的目录。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path" /> has not been set or is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path" /> 尚未设置或无效。

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization of a <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher" /> used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: 结束在窗体上使用或由另一个组件使用的 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher" /> 的初始化。

trans-unit.source: The initialization occurs at run time.
trans-unit.target: 初始化发生在运行时。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] design environment uses this method to end the initialization of a component used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]设计环境使用此方法来结束的组件初始化窗体上使用或由另一个组件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.BeginInit%2A> method starts the initialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.BeginInit%2A>方法开始初始化。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.EndInit%2A> methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.EndInit%2A>方法阻止控件完全初始化之前使用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the instance of <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher" /> is unable to continue monitoring changes or when the internal buffer overflows.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher" /> 的实例无法继续监视更改或内部缓冲区溢出时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised whenever something prevents the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> object from monitoring changes.
trans-unit.target: 某些内容阻止时将引发此事件<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>从监视更改的对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the object is monitoring changes in a remote directory and the connection to that directory is lost, the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Error> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果对象正在监视远程目录中的更改，而与该目录的连接已丢失，<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Error>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The system notifies you of file changes, and it stores those changes in a buffer that the component creates and passes to the APIs.
trans-unit.target: 系统会通知你的文件发生更改，并将那些更改存储的缓冲区中，在组件创建并传递给 Api。

trans-unit.source: If there are many changes in a short time, the buffer can overflow.
trans-unit.target: 如果在短时间内有很多更改，则缓冲区可能溢出。

trans-unit.source: This causes the component to lose track of changes in the directory, and it will only provide blanket notification.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致无法继续在目录中，更改跟踪的组件，它将仅向提供全面通知。

trans-unit.source: Increasing the size of the buffer is expensive, because it comes from non paged memory that cannot be swapped out to disk, so keep the buffer as small as possible.
trans-unit.target: 增加缓冲区的大小将占用大量资源，因为它是来自非分页内存无法换出到磁盘，因此保持缓冲区尽可能小。

trans-unit.source: To avoid a buffer overflow, use the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A>, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A> properties to filter out unwanted change notifications.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免缓冲区溢出，使用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A>， <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A>，和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A>属性筛选掉不需要的更改通知。

trans-unit.source: Common file system operations might raise more than one event.
trans-unit.target: 常见的文件系统操作可能会引发多个事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, when a file is moved from one directory to another, several <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged%2A> and some <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A> and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnDeleted%2A> events might be raised.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当文件从一个目录移到另一个、 几个<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged%2A>和某些<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A>和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnDeleted%2A>可能引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Moving a file is a complex operation that consists of multiple simple operations, therefore raising multiple events.
trans-unit.target: 移动文件一个复杂的操作的多个简单操作组成，因此会引发多个事件。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, some applications (for example, antivirus software) might cause additional file system events that are detected by <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>.
trans-unit.target: 同样，某些应用程序 （例如，防病毒软件） 可能会导致检测到的其他文件系统事件<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the filter string used to determine what files are monitored in a directory.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于确定在目录中监视哪些文件的筛选器字符串。

trans-unit.source: The filter string.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default is "*.\*" (Watches all files.)
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"*。\*"（监视所有文件。）

trans-unit.source: To watch changes in all files, set the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A> property to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 若要监视的所有文件中的更改，将设置<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A>属性为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: To watch a specific file, set the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A> property to the file name.
trans-unit.target: 若要监视的特定文件，<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A>到的文件名称的属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, to watch for changes in the file MyDoc.txt, set the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A> property to "MyDoc.txt".
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要监视的文件 MyDoc.txt 中的更改，请设置<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A>"MyDoc.txt"的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can also watch for changes in a certain type of file.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以观看某种类型的文件中的更改。

trans-unit.source: For example, to watch for changes in any text files, set the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A> property to "*.txt".
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要监视的任何文本文件中的更改，请设置<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A>属性设置为"*.txt"。

trans-unit.source: Use of multiple filters such as "\*.txt|\*.doc" is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 使用多个筛选器，如"\*.txt|\*.doc"不支持。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A> property can be changed after the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> object has started receiving events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A>后可以更改属性<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>对象已开始接收事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about filtering out unwanted notifications, see the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A>, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 有关筛选掉不需要的通知的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A>， <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A>，和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A> accepts wildcards for matching files, as shown in the following examples.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A> 接受通配符匹配的文件，如下面的示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: Filter string
trans-unit.target: 筛选器字符串

trans-unit.source: Watches the following files
trans-unit.target: 监视以下文件

trans-unit.source: All files (default).
trans-unit.target: 所有文件 （默认值）。

trans-unit.source: An empty string ("") also watches all files.
trans-unit.target: 空字符串 ("") 还监视所有文件。

trans-unit.source: *.txt
trans-unit.target: *.txt

trans-unit.source: All files with a "txt" extension.
trans-unit.target: 具有"txt"扩展名的所有文件。

trans-unit.source: *recipe.doc
trans-unit.target: *recipe.doc

trans-unit.source: All files ending in "recipe" with a "doc" extension.
trans-unit.target: 以"配方"扩展名"文档"结尾的所有文件。

trans-unit.source: win*.xml
trans-unit.target: win*.xml

trans-unit.source: All files beginning with "win" with an "xml" extension.
trans-unit.target: 使用"win"开头的"xml"扩展的所有文件。

trans-unit.source: Sales*200?.xls
trans-unit.target: Sales*200?.xls

trans-unit.source: Matches the following:
trans-unit.target: 匹配下列文件：

trans-unit.source: Sales July 2001.xlsSales Aug 2002.xlsSales March 2004.xls
trans-unit.target: 销售年 7 月 2001.xlsSales 日 2002.xlsSales 年 3 月 2004.xls

trans-unit.source: but does not match:
trans-unit.target: 但不匹配：

trans-unit.source: Sales Nov 1999.xls
trans-unit.target: 销售年 11 月 1999.xls

trans-unit.source: MyReport.Doc
trans-unit.target: MyReport.Doc

trans-unit.source: Watches only MyReport.doc
trans-unit.target: 监视仅 MyReport.doc

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> to watch the directory specified at run time.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>监视在运行时指定的目录。

trans-unit.source: The component is set to watch for changes in `LastWrite` and `LastAccess` time, the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory.
trans-unit.target: 该组件设置以监视中的更改`LastWrite`和`LastAccess`时间、 创建、 删除或重命名的目录中的文本文件。

trans-unit.source: If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file prints to the console.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件是更改、 创建，或删除，该文件的路径将打印到控制台。

trans-unit.source: When a file is renamed, the old and new paths print to the console.
trans-unit.target: 当文件已重命名，旧的和新路径打印到控制台。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics> and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics>和<xref:System.IO>对于此示例的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether subdirectories within the specified path should be monitored.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应监视指定路径中的子目录。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if you want to monitor subdirectories; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要监视子目录，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A> to `true` when you want to watch for change notifications for files and directories contained within the directory specified through the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A> property, and its subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A>到`true`如果想要监视的文件和通过指定的目录中包含的目录更改通知<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A>属性，并且及其子目录。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A> property to `false` helps reduce the number of notifications sent to the internal buffer.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A>属性`false`，从而降低了的通知发送到内部缓冲区数。

trans-unit.source: For more information on filtering out unwanted notifications, see the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A> and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 筛选掉不需要通知的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A>和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When `true`, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A> is recursive through the entire sub tree, not just the immediate child directories.
trans-unit.target: 当`true`，<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A>是访问整个子树，而不仅仅是直接子目录递归。

trans-unit.source: The relative path to a file or directory within the sub tree returns in the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs.Name%2A> property of <xref:System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs> and the <xref:System.IO.RenamedEventArgs.OldName%2A> property of <xref:System.IO.RenamedEventArgs>, depending on changes you are watching for.
trans-unit.target: 文件或目录子树内的相对路径返回中<xref:System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs.Name%2A>属性<xref:System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs>和<xref:System.IO.RenamedEventArgs.OldName%2A>属性<xref:System.IO.RenamedEventArgs>，取决于正在监视的更改。

trans-unit.source: You can get the fully qualified path from the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs.FullPath%2A> property of <xref:System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs> and the <xref:System.IO.RenamedEventArgs.OldFullPath%2A> property of <xref:System.IO.RenamedEventArgs>, depending on the changes you are watching for.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从的完全限定的路径<xref:System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs.FullPath%2A>属性<xref:System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs>和<xref:System.IO.RenamedEventArgs.OldFullPath%2A>属性<xref:System.IO.RenamedEventArgs>，取决于正在监视的更改。

trans-unit.source: If a directory is created in the sub tree of the directory you are watching, and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A> is `true`, that directory will automatically be watched.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在监视的目录的子树中创建一个目录和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A>是`true`，将自动监视该目录。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size (in bytes) of the internal buffer.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置内部缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The internal buffer size in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 内部缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default is 8192 (8 KB).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 8192 (8 KB)。

trans-unit.source: You can set the buffer to 4 KB or larger, but it must not exceed 64 KB.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置缓冲区，为 4 KB 或更大，但它不能超过 64 KB。

trans-unit.source: If you try to set the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A> property to less than 4096 bytes, your value is discarded and the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A> property is set to 4096 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试设置<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A>属性为少于 4096 个字节，你的值将被丢弃和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A>属性设置为 4096 个字节。

trans-unit.source: For best performance, use a multiple of 4 KB on Intel-based computers.
trans-unit.target: 为了获得最佳性能，在基于 Intel 的计算机上使用 4 KB 的倍数。

trans-unit.source: The system notifies the component of file changes, and it stores those changes in a buffer the component creates and passes to the APIs.
trans-unit.target: 系统通知文件更改时，组件并将那些更改存储在缓冲区的组件创建，并且传递给 Api。

trans-unit.source: Each event can use up to 16 bytes of memory, not including the file name.
trans-unit.target: 每个事件可以使用最多 16 个字节的内存，不包括文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: If there are many changes in a short time, the buffer can overflow.
trans-unit.target: 如果在短时间内有很多更改，则缓冲区可能溢出。

trans-unit.source: This causes the component to lose track of changes in the directory, and it will only provide blanket notification.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致无法继续在目录中，更改跟踪的组件，它将仅向提供全面通知。

trans-unit.source: Increasing the size of the buffer can prevent missing file system change events.
trans-unit.target: 增加缓冲区的大小可以防止丢失文件系统更改事件。

trans-unit.source: However, increasing buffer size is expensive, because it comes from non-paged memory that cannot be swapped out to disk, so keep the buffer as small as possible.
trans-unit.target: 但是，增加缓冲区大小是占用大量资源的因为它的来源无法换出到磁盘中，因此保持缓冲区尽可能小的非分页内存。

trans-unit.source: To avoid a buffer overflow, use the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A> and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A> properties to filter out unwanted change notifications.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免缓冲区溢出，使用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A>和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A>属性筛选掉不需要的更改通知。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of changes to watch for.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要监视的更改的类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.IO.NotifyFilters" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.NotifyFilters" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is the bitwise OR combination of <see langword="LastWrite" />, <see langword="FileName" />, and <see langword="DirectoryName" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="LastWrite" />、<see langword="FileName" /> 和 <see langword="DirectoryName" /> 的按位“或”组合。

trans-unit.source: You can combine the members of the <xref:System.IO.NotifyFilters> enumeration to watch for more than one type of change at a time.
trans-unit.target: 你可以组合的成员<xref:System.IO.NotifyFilters>要监视的一次更改多个类型的枚举。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can watch for changes in size of a file, and for changes in the `LastWrite` time.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以监视方面的更改中的文件的大小的更改和`LastWrite`时间。

trans-unit.source: This raises an event anytime there is a change in file or folder size, or a change in the `LastWrite` time of the file or folder.
trans-unit.target: 这就提高了事件没有文件或文件夹大小更改或中的更改的任何时候`LastWrite`文件或文件夹的时间。

trans-unit.source: This is one way to filter out unwanted notifications.
trans-unit.target: 这是一种方式筛选掉不需要的通知。

trans-unit.source: For more information on filtering out unwanted notifications, see the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A>, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 筛选掉不需要通知的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A>， <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A>，和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> to watch the directory specified at run time.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>监视在运行时指定的目录。

trans-unit.source: The component is set to watch for changes in `LastWrite` and `LastAccess` time, the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory.
trans-unit.target: 该组件设置以监视中的更改`LastWrite`和`LastAccess`时间、 创建、 删除或重命名的目录中的文本文件。

trans-unit.source: If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file prints to the console.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件是更改、 创建，或删除，该文件的路径将打印到控制台。

trans-unit.source: When a file is renamed, the old and new paths print to the console.
trans-unit.target: 当文件已重命名，旧的和新路径打印到控制台。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics> and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics>和<xref:System.IO>对于此示例的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The value is not a valid bitwise OR combination of the <see cref="T:System.IO.NotifyFilters" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 该值不是 <see cref="T:System.IO.NotifyFilters" /> 值的有效按位“或”组合。

trans-unit.source: The value that is being set is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 正在设置的值无效。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged%2A> is called when changes are made to the size, system attributes, last write time, last access time, or security permissions of a file or directory in the directory being monitored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged%2A> 对大小、 系统属性、 上次写入时间、 上次访问时间或安全权限的文件或目录正在监视的目录中进行更改时调用。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A> property to restrict the number of events raised when the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed> event is handled.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A>属性来限制事件的数目时引发<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed>处理事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A> event is raised as soon as a file is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A>创建一个文件时，就会立即引发事件。

trans-unit.source: If a file is being copied or transferred into a watched directory, the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A> event will be raised immediately, followed by one or more <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged%2A> events.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件正在复制或传输到受监视的目录，<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A>将立即引发事件后, 跟一个或多个<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged%2A>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged(System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged(System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged(System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged(System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A> is called when a file or directory is created in the directory being monitored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A> 在所监视的目录中创建文件或目录时调用。

trans-unit.source: Some common occurrences, such as copying or moving a file or directory, do not correspond directly to an event, but these occurrences do cause events to be raised.
trans-unit.target: 一些常见的事件，例如复制或移动文件或目录，直接与某个事件，并不对应，但这些匹配项便会导致要引发事件。

trans-unit.source: When you copy a file or directory, the system raises a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created> event in the directory to which the file was copied, if that directory is being watched.
trans-unit.target: 复制文件或目录时，系统将引发<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>文件被复制到，如果该目录正在受监视的目录中的事件。

trans-unit.source: If the directory from which you copied was being watched by another instance of <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>, no event would be raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在由另一个实例的监视从中复制的目录<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>，会引发任何事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, you create two instances of <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你创建的两个实例<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>。

trans-unit.source: FileSystemWatcher1 is set to watch "C:\My Documents", and FileSystemWatcher2 is set to watch "C:\Your Documents".
trans-unit.target: FileSystemWatcher1 设置为监视"C:\My Documents"和 FileSystemWatcher2 设置为监视"C:\Your 文档"。

trans-unit.source: If you copy a file from "My Documents" and paste it into "Your Documents", a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created> event will be raised in FileSystemWatcher2, but no event is raised for FileSystemWatcher1.
trans-unit.target: 如果你从"我的文档"复制文件并将其粘贴到"你的文档"，<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>中 FileSystemWatcher2，将引发事件，但对于 FileSystemWatcher1 引发任何事件。

trans-unit.source: Unlike copying, moving a file or directory raises two events.
trans-unit.target: 与复制不同，移动文件或目录将引发两个事件。

trans-unit.source: From the previous example, if you moved a file from "My Documents" to "Your Documents", a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created> event would be raised in FileSystemWatcher2 and a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted> event would be raised in FileSystemWatcher1.
trans-unit.target: 从前面的示例中，如果从"我的文档"文件移至"您的文档"，<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>将在 FileSystemWatcher2 中引发事件和一个<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted>将在 FileSystemWatcher1 中引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A> event is raised as soon as a file is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A>创建一个文件时，就会立即引发事件。

trans-unit.source: If a file is being copied or transferred into a watched directory, the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A> event will be raised immediately, followed by one or more <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged%2A> events.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件正在复制或传输到受监视的目录，<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated%2A>将立即引发事件后, 跟一个或多个<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnChanged%2A>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated(System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnCreated(System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs)" />方法。

trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted" /> 事件。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnDeleted%2A> 删除文件或目录，在所监视的目录中时调用。

trans-unit.source: When you copy a file or directory, the system raises a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created> event in the directory to which the file was copied, if that directory is being watched.
trans-unit.target: 复制文件或目录时，系统将引发<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>文件被复制到，如果该目录正在受监视的目录中的事件。

trans-unit.source: If the directory from which you copied was being watched by another instance of <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>, no event would be raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在由另一个实例的监视从中复制的目录<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>，会引发任何事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, you create two instances of <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你创建的两个实例<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>。

trans-unit.source: FileSystemWatcher1 is set to watch "C:\My Documents", and FileSystemWatcher2 is set to watch "C:\Your Documents".
trans-unit.target: FileSystemWatcher1 设置为监视"C:\My Documents"和 FileSystemWatcher2 设置为监视"C:\Your 文档"。

trans-unit.source: If you copy a file from "My Documents" into "Your Documents", a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created> event will be raised by FileSystemWatcher2, but no event is raised for FileSystemWatcher1.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将文件从"我的文档"复制到"你的文档"， <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created> FileSystemWatcher2，将引发事件，但对于 FileSystemWatcher1 引发任何事件。

trans-unit.source: Unlike copying, moving a file or directory raises two events.
trans-unit.target: 与复制不同，移动文件或目录将引发两个事件。

trans-unit.source: From the previous example, if you moved a file from "My Documents" to "Your Documents", a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created> event would be raised by FileSystemWatcher2 and a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted> event would be raised by FileSystemWatcher1.
trans-unit.target: 从前面的示例中，如果从"我的文档"文件移至"您的文档"， <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created> FileSystemWatcher2 时将引发事件和一个<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted>FileSystemWatcher1 时将引发事件。

trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnDeleted(System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnDeleted(System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnDeleted(System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnDeleted(System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Error" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Error" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnError%2A> is called when an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnError%2A> 发生错误时调用。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnError(System.IO.ErrorEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnError(System.IO.ErrorEventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnError(System.IO.ErrorEventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnError(System.IO.ErrorEventArgs)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.RenamedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.IO.RenamedEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Renamed" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Renamed" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnRenamed%2A> is called when a file or directory within the directory being monitored is renamed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnRenamed%2A> 重命名文件或正在监视的目录中目录时调用。

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.IO.RenamedEventArgs> argument contains information about the renaming operation, such as the type of change, the old and new path, and the old and new name.
trans-unit.target: 其<xref:System.IO.RenamedEventArgs>自变量包含有关操作的重命名操作，如更改、 旧的和新路径和旧的和新名称的类型的信息。

trans-unit.source: Note that its <xref:System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs.Name> property may be null for renamed events if the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> does not get matching old and new name events from the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，其<xref:System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs.Name>属性可以是空如果重命名事件<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>不获取匹配从操作系统的旧和新事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnRenamed(System.IO.RenamedEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnRenamed(System.IO.RenamedEventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnRenamed(System.IO.RenamedEventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.OnRenamed(System.IO.RenamedEventArgs)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the directory to watch.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要监视的目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: The path to monitor.
trans-unit.target: 要监视的路径。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串("")。

trans-unit.source: This is a fully qualified path to a directory.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个目录的完全限定的路径。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A> property is `true`, this directory is the root at which the system watches for changes; otherwise it is the only directory watched.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A>属性是`true`，此目录是系统监视的更改的根目录; 否则它是受监视的唯一目录。

trans-unit.source: To watch a specific file, set the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A> property to the fully qualified, correct directory, and the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A> property to the file name.
trans-unit.target: 若要监视的特定文件，<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A>属性的完全限定的正确的目录，和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Filter%2A>到的文件名称的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A> property supports Universal Naming Convention (UNC) paths.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A>属性支持通用命名约定 (UNC) 路径。

trans-unit.source: This property must be set before the component can watch for changes.
trans-unit.target: 组件可以监视的更改之前，必须设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: When a directory is renamed, the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> automatically reattaches itself to the newly renamed item.
trans-unit.target: 当目录重命名时，<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>自动将自身重新附加到刚刚重命名项。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A> property to "C:\My Documents" and then manually rename the directory to "C:\Your Documents", the component continues listening for change notifications on the newly renamed directory.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你设置<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A>属性设置为"C:\My Documents"和"C:\Your 文档"到的目录，手动重命名，该组件将继续侦听刚刚重命名目录上的更改通知。

trans-unit.source: However, when you ask for the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A> property, it contains the old path.
trans-unit.target: 但是，当你请求<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A>属性，它包含旧路径。

trans-unit.source: This happens because the component determines what directory watches based on the handle, rather than the name of the directory.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为组件确定所监视基于该句柄，而不是目录的名称。

trans-unit.source: Renaming does not affect the handle.
trans-unit.target: 重命名并不影响句柄。

trans-unit.source: So, if you destroy the component, and then recreate it without updating the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A> property, your application will fail because the directory no longer exists.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果销毁该组件，以及然后重新创建它而无需更新<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A>属性，你的应用程序将失败，因为目录不再存在。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> to watch the directory specified at run time.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>监视在运行时指定的目录。

trans-unit.source: The component is set to watch for changes in `LastWrite` and `LastAccess` time, the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory.
trans-unit.target: 该组件设置以监视中的更改`LastWrite`和`LastAccess`时间、 创建、 删除或重命名的目录中的文本文件。

trans-unit.source: If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file prints to the console.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件是更改、 创建，或删除，该文件的路径将打印到控制台。

trans-unit.source: When a file is renamed, the old and new paths print to the console.
trans-unit.target: 当文件已重命名，旧的和新路径打印到控制台。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics> and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics>和<xref:System.IO>对于此示例的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The specified path does not exist or could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路径不存在或找不到。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The specified path contains wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路径包含通配符。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The specified path contains invalid path characters.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路径包含无效路径字符。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a file or directory in the specified <see cref="P:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path" /> is renamed.
trans-unit.target: 重命名指定 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path" /> 中的文件或目录时发生。

trans-unit.source: The `Renamed` event is an <xref:System.IO.RenamedEventHandler> delegate that has the following signature:
trans-unit.target: `Renamed`事件是<xref:System.IO.RenamedEventHandler>具有以下签名的委托：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.RenamedEventArgs> object provides information about the renaming operation, such as the type of the rename (the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs.ChangeType> property), the old and new name, and the old and new path.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.RenamedEventArgs>对象提供了有关重命名操作，例如重命名类型的信息 (<xref:System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs.ChangeType>属性)，旧的和新名称和旧的和新路径。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs.Name> property may be null for renamed events if the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> does not get matching old and new name events from the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs.Name>属性可以是空如果重命名事件<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>不获取匹配从操作系统的旧和新事件。

trans-unit.source: Renaming the directory you are watching will not raise a notification.
trans-unit.target: 重命名所监视的目录不会引发通知。

trans-unit.source: Notifications are only raised for entries inside the directory you are watching.
trans-unit.target: 正在监视的目录内部的条目仅会引发通知。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Renamed> event to display the file path to the console whenever the watched file is renamed.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Renamed>事件监视的文件已重命名时向控制台显示的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" /> for the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" /> for the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" /> 的一个 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher" />。

trans-unit.source: Sites bind a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> to a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.Container%2A> and enable communication between them, as well as provide a way for the container to manage its components.
trans-unit.target: 站点绑定<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>到<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.Container%2A>和启用它们之间的通信，以及为要管理其组件的容器提供的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object used to marshal the event handler calls issued as a result of a directory change.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于封送因目录更改而发出的事件处理程序调用的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke" /> that represents the object used to marshal the event handler calls issued as a result of a directory change.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke" />，表示一个对象，该对象用于封送因目录更改而发出的事件处理程序调用。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.SynchronizingObject%2A> is `null`, methods handling the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed>, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted>, and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Renamed> events are called on a thread from the system thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.SynchronizingObject%2A>是`null`，方法处理<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed>， <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>， <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted>，和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Renamed>事件称为系统线程池中的线程上。

trans-unit.source: For more information on system thread pools, see <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool>.
trans-unit.target: 系统线程池的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed>, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted>, and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Renamed> events are handled by a visual Windows Forms component, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, accessing the component through the system thread pool might not work, or may result in an exception.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed>， <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>， <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted>，和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Renamed>事件由 visual 的 Windows 窗体组件，如处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>，通过系统线程池访问组件可能不起作用，或者可能会导致异常。

trans-unit.source: Avoid this by setting <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.SynchronizingObject%2A> to a Windows Forms component, which causes the methods that handle the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed>, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted>, and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Renamed> events to be called on the same thread on which the component was created.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置来避免这<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.SynchronizingObject%2A>到 Windows 窗体组件时，这将导致产生方法，用于处理<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed>， <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>， <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted>，和<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Renamed>事件在其创建该组件在同一线程上调用。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> is used inside [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] in a Windows Forms designer, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.SynchronizingObject%2A> automatically sets to the control that contains the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>在内部使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]在 Windows 窗体设计器中，<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.SynchronizingObject%2A>自动设置为包含的控件<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you place a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> on a designer for Form1 (which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>) the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.SynchronizingObject%2A> property of <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> is set to the instance of Form1.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你将放置<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>form1 设计器上 (其继承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>)<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.SynchronizingObject%2A>属性<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>被设置为 form1 的实例。

trans-unit.source: A synchronous method that returns a structure that contains specific information on the change that occurred.
trans-unit.target: 一种同步方法，该方法会返回包含已发生的更改上的特定信息的结构。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.WatcherChangeTypes" /> to watch for.
trans-unit.target: 要监视的 <see cref="T:System.IO.WatcherChangeTypes" />。

trans-unit.source: A synchronous method that returns a structure that contains specific information on the change that occurred, given the type of change you want to monitor.
trans-unit.target: 一种同步方法，在给定要监视的更改的类型情况下，它会返回包含已发生的更改上的特定信息的结构。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.WaitForChangedResult" /> that contains specific information on the change that occurred.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.WaitForChangedResult" />，包含关于已发生的更改的特定信息。

trans-unit.source: This method waits indefinitely until the first change occurs and then returns.
trans-unit.target: 此方法一直等到无限期第一次更改发生，并返回。

trans-unit.source: This is the same as using <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.WaitForChanged%2A> with the `timeout` parameter set to -1.
trans-unit.target: 这是与使用相同<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.WaitForChanged%2A>与`timeout`参数设置为-1。

trans-unit.source: This method allows an event handler to be invoked to respond to file changes even if the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许事件处理程序将调用以响应文件更改，即使<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: In some systems, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> reports changes to files using the short 8.3 file name format.
trans-unit.target: 在某些系统中，<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>报告使用短 8.3 文件名格式的文件更改。

trans-unit.source: For example, a change to "LongFileName.LongExtension" could be reported as "LongFi~.Lon".
trans-unit.target: 例如，对"LongFileName.LongExtension"的更改可能被报告为"LongFi ~。Lon"。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.WatcherChangeTypes" /> to watch for.
trans-unit.target: 要监视的 <see cref="T:System.IO.WatcherChangeTypes" />。

trans-unit.source: The time (in milliseconds) to wait before timing out.
trans-unit.target: 超时前等待的时间（以毫秒表示）。

trans-unit.source: A synchronous method that returns a structure that contains specific information on the change that occurred, given the type of change you want to monitor and the time (in milliseconds) to wait before timing out.
trans-unit.target: 一种同步方法，在给定要监视的更改的类型以及在超时前等待的时间（以毫秒表示）的情况下，它会返回包含已发生的更改上的特定信息的结构。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.WaitForChangedResult" /> that contains specific information on the change that occurred.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.WaitForChangedResult" />，包含关于已发生的更改的特定信息。

trans-unit.source: This method waits until a change occurs or it has timed out. A value of -1 for the `timeout` parameter means wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 此方法等待，直到发生更改或已超时。值为-1`timeout`参数表示无限期地等待。

trans-unit.source: This method allows an event handler to be invoked to respond to file changes even if the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许事件处理程序将调用以响应文件更改，即使<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: In some systems, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> reports changes to files using the short 8.3 file name format.
trans-unit.target: 在某些系统中，<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>报告使用短 8.3 文件名格式的文件更改。

trans-unit.source: For example, a change to "LongFileName.LongExtension" could be reported as "LongFi~.Lon".
trans-unit.target: 例如，对"LongFileName.LongExtension"的更改可能被报告为"LongFi ~。Lon"。
